Package com.hotels.beans.transformer

Class MutableObjectTransformationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotels.beans.transformer.AbstractTransformerTest
      • com.hotels.beans.transformer.MutableObjectTransformationTest
  • public class MutableObjectTransformationTest
extends AbstractTransformerTest
    Unit test for all Transformer functions related to Mutable type Java Beans.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MutableObjectTransformationTest()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void beforeMethod()
      Initialized mocks.
      void testFieldTransformationIsAppliedOnlyToASpecificField()
      Test that a given field transformer function is applied only to a specific field even if there are other ones with same name.
      void testFieldTransformationIsAppliedToAllMatchingFields()
      Test that a given field transformer function is applied to all field matching the given name when flatFieldNameTransformation is set to true.
      void testFieldTransformationSkipWorksProperly()
      Test that, given a set of fields for which the transformation has to be skipped, they are actually skipped.
      void testMutableBeanIsCorrectlyCopied()
      Test mutable beans are correctly copied.
      void testThatAnyTypeOfBeanContainsANotExistingFieldInTheSourceObjectIsCorrectlyCopiedThroughTransformerFunctions()
      Test that a bean containing a field not existing in the source object, but with a transformer function defined for such object is correctly copied.
      void testTransformationOnAnExistingDestinationWorksProperly()
      Test transformation on an existing bean is correctly copied.
      void testTransformationWithFieldTransformationWorksProperly​(java.lang.String testCaseDescription, java.lang.String fieldToTransform, java.lang.Object transformationResult)
      Test transformation field with field transformer.
      void testTransformerIsAbleToCopyObjectsWithoutRequiredMethods()
      Test that the transformer is able to copy object even if the source object has no setter methods and the destination object has no setter methods.
      void testTransformThrowsExceptionWhenMutableBeanHasNoDefaultConstructor()
      Test that an exception is thrown if there is no default constructor defined for the mutable bean object.
      void testTransformThrowsNoExceptionIfTheDestinationObjectValuesAreNotValidAndTheValidationIsDisabled()
      Test that no exception is thrown if the destination object don't met the constraints and the validation is disabled.

        Test that a bean containing a field not existing in the source object, but with a transformer function defined for such object is correctly copied.

        public void testTransformationWithFieldTransformationWorksProperly​(java.lang.String testCaseDescription,
                                                                   java.lang.String fieldToTransform,
                                                                   java.lang.Object transformationResult)
        Test transformation field with field transformer.
        Parameters:
        testCaseDescription - the test case description
        fieldToTransform - the name of the field on which apply the transformation
        transformationResult - the value to return after the transformation

      • testFieldTransformationSkipWorksProperly

        public void testFieldTransformationSkipWorksProperly()
